Posts.Content:
Had my first mammogram in 9 years today. Have had no problems, doctor just said I needed one. When finished the technician said I would receive results in a letter. Being the worry wart that I am I asked if I would be notified earlier if they found anything or had a question. She said no and went on to say she didn't see anything but she was not the one that read it. Do they say that to everyone? I worry about
 everything. Know I should have been going yearly but no doctor had mentioned it. Am 63. Any advice will be appreciated.
Posts.Title: Worried......
